TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ArgumentToExpressionModelItemConverter extends System.Object implements class System.Windows.Data.IMultiValueConverter

Docs.summary: Defines the mapping between arguments and expression model items and provides the functionality to convert between these objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This converter can be used to bind data to an <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.View.ExpressionTextBox> or other WPF control. For more information, see [Using an ExpressionTextBox in a custom property editor](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=224791).

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Convert(object[] values, class System.Type targetType, object parameter, class System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture) cil managed
Public Function Convert (values As Object(), targetType As Type, parameter As Object, culture As CultureInfo) As Object
public: virtual System::Object ^ Convert(cli::array <System::Object ^> ^ values, Type ^ targetType, System::Object ^ parameter, System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ culture);
abstract member Convert : obj[] * Type * obj * System.Globalization.CultureInfo -> obj override this.Convert : obj[] * Type * obj * System.Globalization.CultureInfo -> obj

Docs.param: An array that contains the argument to convert. Only the array item at index 1 is used.
Docs.summary: Converts the specified argument to an expression model item.
Docs.returns: An object that contains the expression model item.

Docs.summary: Converts the specified expression model item to an argument.
Docs.returns: An object that contains the argument.
